text: Pas, kist sitamgortar az on ki ʙar Alloh taolo durūƣ meʙandad jo ojotaşro durūƣ mepindorad? Onon kasone hastand, ki nasiʙaşon az onci [dar Lavhi mahfuz] muqarrar şudaast, ʙa eşon xohad rasid, to on goh ki firistodagoni Mo ʙa suroƣaşon meojand, ki çonaşonro ʙigirand, [ʙa onon] megūjand: «Onhoe, ki ʙa çoji Alloh taolo meparastided, kuço hastand»? [Onon] Megūjand: «Az [nazdi] mo gum şudand».Va [in guna] alajhi xud guvohī medihand, ki kofir ʙudaand
